name: Minor Illusion
description: Creates a sound or an image of an object within range.

name: Firebolt
description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object.

name: Acid Splash
description: Hurl a bubble of acid

name: Blade Ward
description: Briefly reduce physical harm

name: Booming Blade
description: Strike with thunder if foe moves

name: Control Flames
description: Shape non-magical Fire

name: Create Bonfire
description: Create a Bonfire that fills a 5-foot cube

name: Dancing Lights
description: You create up to four torch-sized lights

name: Druidcraft
description: Minor nature tricks

name: Eldritch Blast
description: beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range

name: Friends
description: briefly Charm a Creature

name: Frostbite
description: cause numbing frost to form on one creature

name: Guidance
description: Boost ally’s skill check

name: Gust
description: Use Wind to Push or disperse

name: Light
description: Illuminate objects

name: Lightning Lure
description: Use a Lash of Lightning to yank a foe closer

name: Mage Hand
description: Crate a spectral hand you control

name: Magic Stone
description: envelope 3 pebbles with magic

name: Mending
description: Repair any object so long as the damage doesn't exceed a 1-foot cube

name: Message
description: Whisper across distance

name: Mind Sliver
description: Drive a Spike of Psychic energy into the mond of a creature

name: Mold Earth
description: Shape terrain in a 5-foot cube

name: Poison Spray
description: puff of noxious gas from your palm

name: Prestidigation
description: Minor magical tricks

name: Ray of Frost
description: Cold beam slows foes

name: Resistance
description: Boost saving throws briefly

name: Sacred Flame
description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature

name: Shape Water
description: Shape water in a 5-foot cube

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch

name: Sword Burst
description: create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you

name: Thaumaturgy
description: Yor Voice Booms throughout a Radius

name: Thorn WHip
description: vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature

name: Thunderclap
description: create a burst of thunderous sound

name: Truestrike
description: grants you a brief insight into the target’s defenses

name: Vicious Mockery
description: Emotional Damage
